trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Conroe
There were no other sightings in Conroe on or around November 30th 1995
Summary: myself my cousin and my best friend were out on a golfcourse in the early morning hours goofin off and a ufo came over the trees above our heads followed by military helicopters from the local base
divs: sighting detailsmyself my cousin and my best friend were out on the river plantation golf course in the middle of the night goofin off when i spotted a light comming thru the trees....we were at a green surrounded by high trees so u couldnt see far off in the distance as the light got brighter we were fixated on it as it came closer and it came to a hover right over the treeline above our heads the craft was so close i could have thrown a rock and hit it it made no noises at all u could hear crickets and nothing else it scared me so bad i took off running down the fairway to get out from underneath it i didnt know if it would fall on us but they stayed underneath the object bout 75 yds out i turned back to look and everything was weird kinda like time stopped or something i stood there frozen thinking we were gonna get beamed up or something and the craft sat there motionless without any noise whatsoever it looked to have sum kind of running lights but the bright light i had org saw had gone off .....well like i said there was no noise at all and in the distance u could hear apache helicopters from the local airport\armybase and within about a minute of hearing the helis the craft slowly receeded back into the trees and we couldnt see it anymore and the apaches were straffing the area low level flying they were very loud u could hear em from way off but u couldnt hear the craft maybe 50 ft above us i cant tell u how big it was only tht when it came over us i had to run to get out from underneath it i dont know how to explain this i have felt crazy for a longtime and would think i was crazy if my cousin and friend werent there i dont tell people about this and we dont talk about it me and my best friend occasionally mention it to people and they laugh which pisses me off i cant explain it and idk that nite seemed to stop ina weird way idk but afterwards i didnt notice it for a longtime but there r 3 small pea sized scars ina triangle shape on my stomach under my right pectoral muscle that i cannot explain as to how it got there to this day i dont know how it got there and dont know what it is other than a weird 3 dot triangle type scar ........... this is the first time for me to come foward about something like this i half *** think im crazy but i know im not its been years since its happened and i wouldnt want it to happen again it scared me worse than i think i h ave ever been scared....... and thats my story............
